turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order coffee for pickup at my local Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Like a grande caffè mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say a grande cafe mocha, 2% milk and whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2849 East New York Avenue, Aurora, IL 60502.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is the starbucks store located at 28th 49 east new york avenue?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: all set! your coffee will be ready for pick up soon!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
